clusters_empty_subtitle:
It looks like you don't have any clusters to use.
Let's add one !
cluster_new_wrong_url: Please enter a valid cluster url
cluster_remove_subtitle: Are you sure your want to remove this cluster?
deployment_new_empty_image: You need to specify an image
deployment_rollback_alert: Do you want to rollback to revision #{revision}?
deploy_index_failed_title: Can't fetch this store, verify your connection or try another url
deploy_no_tiller_dp_alert_subtitle:
Do you want that we create one for you? 

 WARNING: Tiller will be exposed via a NodePort service and will be insecure
deploy_no_tiller_svc_alert_subtitle: We didn't find a tiller-deploy service in this cluster, do you want that we create one for you?
deploy_no_pod_alert_subtitle: We can't find the Tiller pod, verifiy your connection and your setup and try again
deploy_coming_soon_subtitle: This is an Alpha Feature made available for testing. Tiller will be deployed but you will not be able to deploy Charts via Cabin, use your local Helm client.
deploy_empty_subtitle: You can deploy a new release by selecting a chart in the deploy tab
service_new_description: You need to choose a deployment to expose and a port
service_new_no_deployments_alert: We can't find a deployment to expose
service_open_browser_no_node: We can't find a node ready to open this service
settings_repo_name_placeholder: Give this store a short name
settings_repo_add_alert: Please fill both url and name fields
settings_repo_failed: Can't fetch this store url, try again with another one
alert_error: Something went wrong, try again later
rolling_update_multiple_containers: Can't perform rolling update with multiple containers
gke_clusters_empty_subtitle: Check permissions on this project and reload
